description.content:
This hotel is located at the nerve centre of the commercial area of Channai and provides a good point of departure for shopping centres, consulates, hospitals, Marina Towers and tourist destinations. It is the newest business class hotel and was designed in order to satisfy all needs of business travellers. The hotel is around a 5-minute car journey from the main train station. Transfer to the inland and international airport takes about 30 minutes by car.

The air-conditioned hotel comprises banqueting halls, a hotel safe and a currency exchange counter. In addition, there is a café, a bar and restaurant serving a variety of cuisines. The hotel affords large rooms spanning 360 m². Additionally, medical assistance, room, parking and laundry services are also offered to guests.

They come with a bathroom, a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV with pay programmes, a fridge, a travel desk, centrally regulated air conditioning and a hire safe.

The Raintree St. Mary is a marvellous city hotel which enjoy a fantastic situation very close to the business, shopping and leisure areas of the city. Chennai Airport is 13.2 km away and Chennai Railway Station is 9.3 km from the hotel. This luxurious business hotel features contemporary guest rooms and suites fitted with the most up-to-date amenities. It is a stunning blend of comfort, style and high quality service ideal for business and corporate travellers.

This 4 star hotel is located in the city centre of Chennai and was established in 2003. The Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre/gym. All 174 rooms are equipped with minibar, hairdryer, safe and air conditioning.

The hotel is located in the heart of the city, just 13 km from Chennai Airport, 10 km from the central railway station and 10 km from the local bus station. It is set in a serene arboreal locale in the heart of the commercial district, with entertainment and shopping avenues in close proximity.

Superior business facilities and devoted attention to all needs make this city hotel a truly one of its kind business hotel. The grand, yet peaceful ambience of the hotel is accentuated by imposing stairways, Italian marble, and intricate gold leaf work. Zodiac, the lounge bar, offers an extensive choice of branded and mixed drinks. There are 162 rooms in total spread over 12 floors. It is air-conditioned and has a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange facility, lift access, café, hairdresser's salon, a number of restaurants, conference facilities and Internet access (subject to fees), as well as room and laundry services (both subject to fees). Parking facilities are available to guests arriving by car.

The hotel offers well-appointed rooms, including a presidential suite, 3 studio apartments and 6 executive suites. They are fitted with electronic door locks, an electronic safe, dual telephone lines (with international direct dial facility), personalised voice mail facility, hi-speed broadband Internet access, and a modern en suite bathroom. The hotel also offers a choice of pillows: anti-snore, buckwheat, bolster or foam. A hairdryer, satellite/cable TV, minibar, mini-fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and centrally-regulated air conditioning also feature.

The hotel has an indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam room, massage service and gym.

The hotel has several options when it comes to meals. Seasons, an all-day dining restaurant, offers buffet for breakfast, lunch and dinner; Kebabs & Rotis serves traditional and authentic cuisines from across India; Pergola, the open-air restaurant, offers a relaxed, casual and friendly dining ambience.

The hotel is located in downtown Chennai, 9 km away from Chennai (Madras) Airport, 10 km from the railway station and only 500 m from the local bus station.

This city hotel, which was renovated in 2005, exudes a graceful and timeless elegance, combining a sense of the past with contemporary facilities. Elegant and exceptional amenities come together with a signature-brand of service to create an engaging atmosphere. The hotel offers 76 rooms in total spread over 8 floors. Facilities include air conditioning, a lobby with 24-hour reception, a doctor-on-call service, in-house laundry (subject to fees), currency exchange facility, 24-hour room service (subject to fees), hotel safe, lift access, a choice of restaurants and Internet access (subject to fees). There is also a business centre. The Pub Million Dollars is a contemporary bar, with a great atmosphere radiating the sophisticated allure of today's generation with a wide variety of beverages available. The bar is cosy and intimate, making it the ideal venue for pre or post-dinner drinks or a simple evening cocktail. It also offers an extensive range of fine wines, liquors and cigars. Parking facilities are available to guests arriving by car.

The rooms include centrally regulated air conditioning, cable/satellite LCD TV, telephone with direct dial facility, split and king-size bed, dressing table with mirror, refrigerator with soft drinks and minibar, tea/coffee making facilities, in-room safe deposit box, mahogany finish wardrobe and WLAN access. The elegant en suite bathrooms are built with the finest materials, rich woods, fabrics and marbles.

The hotel offers a health club.

Green Chillies offers extraordinary food, service, exotic beverages and freshly ground coffee. The multi-cuisine restaurant Royal Palate includes flavours from traditional south and north Indian cuisine, as well as more international fare in the form of Chinese and Italian dishes.

Situated in Chennai's business district, the luxury hotel The Park Chennai is set on the premises of Gemini Studios, a former legendary film studio. It offers elegant and stylish accommodation as well as a large variety of world-class services and amenities including a fantastic spa area overlooking the city, a rooftop pool surrounded by a lounge area boasting panoramic views or a 24-hour restaurant. The hotel is surrounded by excellent shopping centres as well as entertainment venues. A wonderful hotel, ideal both for business and leisure travellers.

Fortune Select Palms is located in the heart of Chennai, on the Old Mahabalipuram Road. It is conveniently situated 18 kms from the central railway station of Chennai, 20 kms from the local bus station and 17 km from Chennai Airport. It is a luxurious home to the aesthetic cultural heritage, recreated with state-of art architecture inculcating contemporary modishness. All rooms are well appointed, decorated in a contemporary style. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a gym. There is also a poolside snack bar. For an additional fee, guests may use the health centre, which includes a sauna and steam room, as well as massage and spa facilities. The hotel offers splendid restaurants which serve Indian and exotic cuisines. There is a 24-hour coffee shop, and the Oriental Pavilion restaurant specialises in Chinese cuisine. Come stay with us and experience the real Chennai ambiance.

address.content: 142, Rajiv Gandhi Salai, Old Mahabalipuram Road,0

name.content: Radha Regent - A Sarovar Hotel, Chennai

description.content: "This upscale hotel enjoys a convenient setting in Chennai within easy access of the centre of the city. Situated in Arumbakkam, guests of the hotel will appreciate the ease of access to commercial centres and tourist interest areas. Marina Beach is located just 10 kms.This city hotel has captured the essence of Chennai, offering a delightful blend of Tamil hospitality with impeccable contemporary service. The hotel features elegant style and a high atrium lobby giving the impression of expansive space, beautifully accentuated by the light flowing through the translucent roof. The guest rooms are well-appointed and exude peace and tranquility offering a haven away from the city. The hotel also provides a superb restaurant where guests can experience the ultimate in sublime dining and a selection of cuisines from every corner of the world."

Located in the heart of the city, the hotel is well connected to various businesses, commercial and shopping spots in Chennai. The world famous Marina beach and the US consulate are less than a kilometre away from the establishment. Guests are welcomed into a lobby, where facilities include a safe and a currency exchange. Guests may dine in the bar and the restaurant. Business guests may use the conference facilities. Room and laundry services are also provided. Each room has a bathroom with a shower and a bath. They offer air conditioning, a phone and a safe. Further facilities include a fridge, a fully stocked minibar and a TV. For added convenience, there are coffee making facilities. The hotel offers modern gym equipment. At lunchtime, there is an elaborate buffet, along with à la carte meals as well.

The hotel is located at T. Nagar, in the heart of the city's shopping precinct and it is 12 km away from the international airport.

A landmark of hospitality in the heart of Chennai for cost conscious corporate and leisure travellers, this hotel's decor and service match any luxury category hotel. It sets very high standards of luxury, comfort and service for itself. Guests are welcomed into a lobby at this air-conditioned establishment. There is a currency exchange facility as well as a café, a bar and a restaurant on the premises. Business travellers will appreciate the hotel's conference facilities and guests can take advantage of the hotel's room and laundry services. There is a car park for those guests arriving by car.

Each room has an en suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. A hairdryer is included. Amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, a safe and a minibar.

The hotel is oriented towards business travellers and offers no entertainment facilities.

Cosy, classy and aesthetically designed, the multi-cuisine restaurant serves a lavish buffet with the choice of Tandoor, Indian, South Indian, Chinese and continental cuisine with typical flavours and also available à la carte, giving a truly global flavour and an unforgettable taste experience. The 24-hour coffee shop is situated on the lobby level for those racing against time. Experience the quick eats and round the clock service with a penchant for taste. There is also a bar stocked with a select and wide variety of Indian and international brands of liquor and wines.

address.content: NO. 62, THIRUMALAI PILLAI ROAD. T. NAGAR,

description.content:
Located in the heart of the city's business centre, the hotel is in a favourable location in Chennai, which makes it one of the most preferred choices of both business and holiday travellers. The central railway station is located roughly 7 km away and Chennai International Airport is only 11 km from the hotel.

This city hotel offers deluxe and theme suites, a total of 133 guestrooms, which cater to the every need of weary business travellers. It also offers conference halls with the best of residential and non-residential banquet and conferencing facilities. Offering a number of facilities to ensure the finest stay, this hotel is one of the most frequented hotels in Chennai. The air-conditioned hotel offers a lobby, currency exchange facilities, lift access, hairdressing salon, bar and restaurants. Room service, laundry service and a car park are also available.

Decorated in a pure European style, the elegantly designed and brilliantly furnished rooms make the hotel stay a pleasure. All the hotel rooms have air conditioning with individual temperature control system, a minibar, direct dial telephone and satellite television broadcasting the major channels. The rooms are also equipped with a shower and safe.

Guests can now rejuvenate themselves at the Ayush Therapy Centre inside the hotel. There is also an outdoor swimming pool and gym in the hotel.

There is a coffee shop, bar and 2 restaurants in the hotel. The buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner are served in the café. Indian, Chinese and Thai cuisine is served in the restaurants.

address.content: NO. 120, SIR THYAGARAYA ROAD, T. NAGAR,

description.content:
This hotel is located in the heart of Chennai, close to the business district and the commercial and shopping centres. It is situated just a 10-minute drive from the railway station, 4.5 km from Marina Beach and 25 minutes from Chennai International Airport.

This city hotel comprises a total of 100 rooms, and facilities on offer to guests include a coffee shop, bar, restaurant and conference facilities.

The hotel offers comfortable guest rooms and suites which are neatly maintained and come equipped with a host of modern amenities. All come with a TV, a minibar and air conditioning.

The hotel features a health club with facilities such as gym, a massage parlour, a steam room, a sauna and a hot tub. Other leisure facilities include a squash court and a billiards room.

The hotel restaurant serves Indian, continental and Chinese cuisine. And the bar offers guests alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, cocktails and mocktails.

This city hotel is located near to Chennai's business district and a host of the city's major attractions. The hotel is approximately 3 km from Egmore railway station and Madras International (Meenambakkam) airport is around 13 km away.

This 4-star hotel in the centre of Chennai is fully air-conditioned and offers a total of 70 guest rooms. Facilities include a lobby, hotel safe, currency exchange facilities, a cafe and bar, conference facilities and both room and laundry services.

The hotel offers centrally air-conditioned rooms and exclusive suites, each of which are extravagantly designed and well appointed with luxurious beds and soft furnishings. In-room amenities include a TV, Internet access, a bathtub, safe, minibar and tea and coffee making facilities.

A trendy function room with live music keeps guests' spirits high even after a hard day's work.

The hotel has an excellent dining facility and guests can also enjoy the high-quality dishes from the comfort of their luxurious guest room.

Strategically located in the heart of Chennai, the hotel is barely a 15-minute drive from the major business and shopping districts, including the Centre Plaza. Chennai Railway Station is about 10 km away whilst Chennai Airport is about 12 km from the hotel.

This city hotel consists of a total of 171 rooms. Facilities include air conditioning, a lobby, coffee shop, bar, nightclub, restaurant, and room and laundry services. Business travellers will also appreciate the conference facilities.

The lavishly proportioned rooms in the hotel have been designed to provide an ambience that soothes and refreshes. Elegantly fitted with every prerequisite for a luxurious stay, the rooms reflect opulent refinement at its very best. Each comes with a minibar, hairdryer, TV and air conditioning.

Leisure options in the luxury hotel are ample and include a swimming pool, a dedicated spa and health club and a large selection of both indoor and outdoor games. Guests can also enjoy a workout in the hotel gym.

The multi-cuisine restaurant offers amazing delicacies, whilst the stylish pub has a wide selection of delicious drinks on offer. The coffee shop serves really good snacks and beverages. There is also a chic bar that serves an exotic range of the finest drinks.

This 5 star hotel is located close to the airport of Chennai. It is 12.0 Km from the Museum. The Hotel has a coffee shop, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre/gym. All 101 rooms are equipped with minibar, hairdryer, safe, trouser press, ironing set and air conditioning.

address.content: G. S. T. ROAD, THOMAS MOUNT,531

description.content: "This hotel is located conveniently on the GST road and is near the new business districts of Sriperumbudur, Maramalianagar and Guindy. It is just 10 minutes away from the Chennai Trade Centre. The international airport is only 3 kms from the hotel and the railway station is about 12 kms away.This business-class hotel is set amongst 5 acres of lush tropical gardens and welcomes its guests for a relaxing stay. The hotel provides excellent accommodation units and business facilities in order to satisfy the needs of both the business community and leisure travelers. All rooms are elegantly designed and well-furnished and come complete with all necessary amenities. The guests can enjoy a workout in the gym, work up a sweat in the sauna or enjoy a dip in the hotel swimming pool."

This city hotel is around 2 km from the city centre and close to the Marina Beach. It is approximately 5 km from a bus stop and the main railway station, which guests can reach easily in a few minutes. Chennai Madras International (Meenambakkam) Airport is only 11 km from the eco hotel.

The hotel offers a total of 235 rooms and facilities available to guests include a hotel safe, coffee shop and conference facilities.

The hotel offers modern facilities and services with elegant and tastefully furnished guest rooms, which feature essential amenities to ensure guests a pleasurable stay. In-room amenities include an en suite bathroom, TV, radio, minibar, tea and coffee making facilities, an ironing set and air conditioning.

During their leisure time, guests can enjoy a workout in the well-equipped gym, ensuring that they can maintain their fitness regime. They may also relax in the sauna or take a dip in the outdoor swimming pool.

Guests can dine at the on-site multi-cuisine restaurant that serves a variety of delicious Indian, Chinese and continental cuisine. After a tiring day, guests can also sip their favourite drink in the cosy bar.

Vivanta by Taj Connemara, Chennai is the only heritage hotel in the city, built in 1854 as the Imperial Hotel, renamed Albany in 1886, and finally re-established as The Connemara in 1890. 'Reopened' in 1937 and the legendary architect Geoffrey Bawa added his touch to the tower and pool that binds in 1974. The rooms and banquet facilities that offer the ultimate in urban relaxation are some of the largest and most spacious in the city and are equipped with modern amenities. Well furnished and equipped with the latest facilities for maximum comfort, the Superior Charm rooms offer 450 square meters of luxurious space. Enjoy international direct dialing, minibar, LCD satellite television, wireless Internet. These rooms are equipped with a living room and a desk and are designed with ample room for natural light.

"This luxury hotel is located in the heart of the city. Chennai railway station is just 2 kms away, whilst other nearby attractions include the British Council (5 kms), Marina Beach (8 kms), Tidel Park (18 kms) and Cholamandal village (50 kms). Chennai Airport is only 12 kms away from the accommodation.This exquisite hotel comprises stylish and luxurious guest rooms and suites. All of the rooms are equipped with a host of amenities designed to make guests' stays as convenient as possible. The ensuite bathrooms feature a bathtub/shower and hairdryer. The beds are double/king-size and the kitchenettes are well-equipped including a minibar/mini fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. The rooms also come with air conditioning and a terrace. The cosy hotel restaurant is an eminently popular place, where guests can enjoy an array of dining options. "

This city hotel is located in the heart of Chennai on Sardar Patel Road in Guindy, in close proximity to Tidel Park which houses Cognizant, Satyam Computers, Tata Consultancy Services and HCL Technologies. The hotel is also easily accessible from the governor's residence, Anna University and the Indian Institute of Technology, Chennai. The railway station is a 45-minute ride away via public transport and Madras International (Meenambakkam) Airport is approximately 7 km away.

The air-conditioned hotel offers 108 rooms and suites, a business centre with conference rooms, a coffee shop and bar, plus room and laundry services. The refreshing interiors and large windows are designed to bring the outdoors into the building.

Each of the well-appointed rooms, studio rooms and suites are ergonomically designed for greater comfort, to make business on the move more productive. Interconnecting and non-smoking rooms are available on request. Each room features an en suite bathroom, direct dial telephone, satellite TV, tea and coffee making facilities and individually regulated air conditioning.

The hotel features a state-of-the-art gym, equipped with three electronic treadmills, an aero cycle, one single-station multi-gym, elliptical cross trainers and free weights. There is also an outdoor swimming pool.

The bright and inviting multi-cuisine coffee shop serves Indian, European, American and Pan-Asian cuisines. At the lounge, guests are invited to have a go on the PlayStation, enjoy a game of chess or play pool as they listen to music and sip a drink of their choice.

This city hotel is conveniently located in Kilpauk, in the heart of Chennai, India. Business visitors can take full advantage of the hotel's location as it enables them to reach the nearby major business centres in a short space of time. The bus station is around 3 km from the hotel and the main railway station is roughly 5 km away. It is approximately 18 km from both the domestic and international terminals of Chennai airport.

The hotel is a budget property in Chennai which warmly greets its guests and provides them good hospitality services. The modern amenities and services of this hotel will truly fulfil guests' needs and desires and provide good value for money. This property is the ideal choice for both business and leisure travellers. The air-conditioned hotel offers a total of 52 rooms and facilities available to guests include a lobby, currency exchange facilities, a bar and restaurant, WLAN Internet access and room and laundry services.

The hotel offers elegant and functional rooms, which feature an en suite bathroom with shower and bathtub, a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access, an in-room safe, mini fridge and individually regulated air conditioning to ensure guests enjoy a comfortable and memorable stay.

There is a spa centre in the hotel and guests can enjoy a work out in the on-site gym.

Guests can enjoy their evening by sampling the Indian, continental, Chinese and other special cuisines on offer in the on-site restaurant, where they will receive a good, friendly service. They can also visit the bar, where tempting concoctions are served.

The hotel is ideally set among 3.5 acres of exquisitely landscaped gardens and within easy reach of the city's business districts. Chennai International Airport is approximately 7 km away.The air-conditioned, 240-room hotel is the perfect destination for business travellers who demand unparalleled luxury and convenience. Guests are welcomed in a lobby with 24-hour reception. Further facilities include a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities, a bar and a restaurant. Business guests will appreciate the hotel's conference facilities, while both room and laundry services are on offer as well.The hotel features 112 standard rooms, 46 Royal Club Rooms, 11 Deluxe Suites, 59 Deluxe Rooms, 10 Executive Suites, a Royal Suite and a Presidential Suite. The room facilities are simply world class with modern facilities and room service to pamper the guests. In-room amenities include a private bathroom with a shower/bath, direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, safe, minibar, fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. All accommodation is air-conditioned.There is an outdoor pool and a gym in the hotel. Guests may also enjoy the tennis facilities on site.Overlooking the picturesque gardens and pool, the authentic seafood restaurant in the hotel serves a wide range of dishes cooked to guests' specifications. Live show cooking adds to the charm of dining.

The hotel is centrally located in close proximity to many of Chennai's most important places and approximately 17 km from Madras International (Meenambakkam) airport. It will take around 20 minutes to reach the hotel depending upon traffic conditions.

In providing a great atmosphere in addition to excellent facilities, the hotel has established a real name for itself. The establishment offers a peaceful atmosphere to travellers looking for relaxation and comfort, as well as all the modern facilities that are essential for a comfortable stay. The choicest accommodation units, business facilities, dining options and a homely atmosphere are a few of the factors that make this residence the ideal place to stay. Facilities available to guests include a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a TV lounge, restaurant, conference facilities and both room and laundry services.

The hotel offers guest rooms spread across 7 floors, including Deluxe rooms, Executive rooms and Suites, all of which are equipped with one-touch room panels, satellite TV, double-glazed soundproof windows, and an en suite bathroom with a bathtub.

The hotel offers a multi-cuisine restaurant which serves a variety of food, such as continental, Indian and Asian dishes.

This hotel is located in Chennai, India, 17 kms from the airport and 5 kms from the railway station. This 20 room boutique hotel was designed by Vikram Phadke and the elegant, contemporary hotel features a collection of individually conceived artistic spaces. Each room features an en suite bathroom with shower and bathtub, a TV, minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. There is an indoor swimming pool and guests may also relax on the sun terrace or in the steam room, or work out in the gym. Massages and spa treatments are also offered. Guests can be assured of a pleasant stay with excellent service when they choose this hotel.

address.content: 23/13 KHADER NAWAZ KHAN RD, NUNGAMBAKKAM, CHENNAI,

description.content:
Situated just 12 km away from Chennai International Airport, Crowne Plaza Chennai Adyar Park offers luxuriously furnished rooms with WiFi.Its elegant rooms have all modern facilities. It has an outdoor pool, 6 dining options, fitness centre and 24-hour front desk to assist guests. 
Dakshin Restaurant which serves authentic Indian cuisines or The Residency and Cappuccino, which serves an array of International dishes. Grilled cuisine with fine selection of wines can be enjoyed at On The Rocks while The Westminster is a bar. it also has a nightclub.
Conveniently placed just 4 km away from popular Marina Beach, the hotel is also 7 km away from the Egmore Railway Station. The Koyambedu Bus Station is 12 km. The Kapaleeshwaar Temple is 3 km and the Government Museum, Chennai is 7 km.

Ideally located in the centre of the city's IT corridor - Old Mahabalipuram Road, the hotel provides easy access to many nearby businesses, including Infosys Technologies, Cognizant, Accenture and Polaris. Chennai International Airport is 28 km and the Chennai central railway station is about 36 km away from the hotel.

The hotel provides ideal accommodation and unmatched services at affordable prices to both business and leisure travellers. This air-conditioned hotel welcomes guests in a lobby. There are 85 guest rooms at this establishment, and facilities include a currency exchange service, café and a bar. Conference facilities are available to business travellers and Internet access is also provided. Guests can take advantage of the laundry service and the car park. The hotel offers 24-hour room service in order to make each guest's stay a pleasant experience.

The hotel comprises elegantly appointed, fully furnished and spacious guest rooms. They are equipped with air conditioning, coffee makers, a direct dial telephone and a cable TV. Moreover, each room has an en suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. Non-smoking rooms are also provided by the hotel.

The hotel features The Bytes restaurant and Zero Degrees Bar.

This superb hotel enjoys a central location close to the US Consulate, and the IT and manufacturing area of Chennai. The hotel is just 7 kms from Chennai Central railway station and 13 kms from Chennai International Airport.Guests will be impressed by the serene, tranquil atmosphere that resounds throughout the hotel, and the minimalistic style which is brought to life by works of art which adorn the walls. The guest rooms exude warmth and luxury, with crisp, white features and subtle hints of colour through Indian decor. The hotel provides business guests with the convenience of first-class meeting and conference facilities, delivering the highest degree of excellence. All guests are invited to dine in style in the superb surrounds of the restaurant where a host of culinary delights await.

The hotel is located on Valluvarkottam High Road and is easily accessible from the city's exciting attractions, shopping arcades and various entertainments areas. The airport is about 17 km from the hotel, while the railway station is about 19 km away.

This boutique hotel has undergone extensive renovation and now re-emerged with a new look and feel of real luxury. The hotel is renowned for its impeccable service and comprises a total of 40 luxurious guest rooms, a lounge bar and a trendy themed bar that provides a true sense of comfort and relaxation. The air-conditioned establishment also features a lobby with a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and a newspaper stand. Guests can dine in the restaurant, conduct business in the conference rooms and take advantage of the Internet access, room service and a laundry service. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicle in the car park on site.

The rooms are fully furnished, well-decorated, spacious and comfortable. The en suite bathrooms come complete with a shower and a bath, while either double of king-size beds ensure a great night's sleep. A direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access, a safe, minibar and tea and coffee making facilities also feature in all rooms, as does air conditioning and central heating.

This 3 star hotel is located in the city centre of Chennai. It is a short drive away from the Marina Beach and the nearest station is NA. The Hotel has a coffee shop and a fitness centre/gym. All 50 rooms are equipped with minibar, safe, ironing set and air conditioning.

The Chennai hotel is strategically located close to Asia's largest bus terminal (CMBT) and a business area. The hotel is approximately 14 km from Chennai's international and domestic airports, 7 km from Chennai's Central and Egmore railway stations and also 7 km from Chennai Trade Centre.

This well-appointed hotel provides a blend of contemporary design, restrained elegance and a very calm and peaceful ambiance. The hotel provides quality accommodation in its 39 rooms and high-quality services for a pleasant stay. The spacious conference hall features the Imperial, Majestic Crystal I and Crystal II functions rooms with a wide range of conference facilities. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe and currency exchange. There is a café, a bar and a restaurant and guests will appreciate the wireless Internet access. Guests can also take advantage of the room and laundry services. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.

The hotel provides beautifully furnished, centrally air-conditioned luxury rooms to the highest global standards and a peaceful ambience to relax in. The rooms are spacious and equipped with designer fittings, paintings, an en suite bathroom, direct dial telephone, TV with satellite channels and an in-room safe to ensure a comfortable stay.

This hotel is located in Sholinganallur, in Chennai, in close proximity to the Tiger Caves and Dakshin Chithra. Guests will find Egmore railway station 24 km away and it is 19 km away from Chennai Airport.

This air-conditioned hotel provides accommodation with loft-inspired design, modern exteriors and smart furniture. In addition to a lobby area with a 24-hour reception, facilities on offer to guests include a hotel safe, lift access to the upper floors, a newspaper stand and a games room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the cafe or bar and dine at the restaurant. Conference facilities are available to business travellers and guests will appreciate the Internet access. They can also take advantage of the room and laundry services. There is a car park for those arriving by car.

The rooms are lavishly designed and feature ultra modern furniture and a high level of comfort. All come with an en suite bathroom with a shower, hot/cold running water and a hairdryer and offer a king-size bed. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, wireless Internet access and an electronic safe. Furthermore, a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities, an ironing set and individually regulated air conditioning are provided in all accommodation as standard.

Guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool and work out in the gym.

This business hotel is located next to the Olympia Technology Park in Guindy. The hotel is superbly situated just a 15 minutes' drive from the international and domestic airports.The hotel enjoys a blend of contemporary and traditional Indian decor, that is sure to impress even the most discerning guests. The hotel offers luxuriously-appointed guest rooms with functional space and ergonomic style, designed to meet the needs of precise business travellers. Guests will also appreciate the hotel's exemplary choice of first-class meeting facilities, for added convenience and comfort and the highest degree of excellence. Guests will be impressed by the hotel's first-class leisure facilities for guests' relaxation and dining amenities which feature countless upscale restaurants, ensuring that visitors enjoy a remarkable trip.

The Raintree Hotel Anna Salai is an impressive luxurious hotel of contemporary structure and décor conveniently situated near the business hub of Chennai the heart of the city. Guests will enjoy easy access to many attractions of cultural and touristic interests, including the Madras Music Academy, Elliott's Beach and the Santhome Basilica. This eco-friendly hotel boasts excellent accommodations and it provides world-class services and amenities combined with the traditional South Indian hospitality.

This apartment hotel is strategically located near the beach and just a 10-minute drive from the central business district of Chennai with its popular shopping areas, entertainment hubs and eateries. This location is convenient for both business and leisure travellers, and the hotel offers a variety of amenities for both families and those travelling alone. Apartments feature fully-equipped kitchenettes in addition to separate sleeping and living areas with home entertainment systems. The hotel has two international restaurants, a lounge bar, and a barbeque rooftop garden with a play area for children in addition to an extensive fitness centre complete with pool, sauna and steam room and a rooftop garden with Jacuzzi.

address.content: SATHYADEV AVENUE, MRC NAGAR, SANTHOME, CHENNAI,94

description.content:
The hotel is located just opposite Chennai Mofussil Bus Terminus in Koyambedu and provides easy access to shopping areas, theatres, Marina Beach and business districts such as SIPCOT industrial park, Sriperumbudur and Oragadam. The hotel is centrally located between the airport and Chennai railway station and is within 8 km of both.

The hotel features a unique design combined with traditional hospitality and impeccable services, to meet the needs of all kinds of travellers. The air-conditioned hotel features a wide range of accommodation options. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers 24-hour reception and a hotel safe, as well as currency exchange facilities and a cloakroom. Guests can pick up something to read from the newspaper stand, enjoy a drink at the bar and dine in the restaurant. Business travellers will appreciate the convenience of conference facilities, banquet halls and comprehensive business facilities equipped with every modern convenience. Room and laundry services are also available. The hotel therefore ensures guests a memorable and comfortable stay.

The hotel provides accommodation complete with all sorts of comforts to make guests feel at home. All the rooms are well furnished, spacious and modern. They are en suite with a shower and a bath. Guests can enjoy a good night's rest on their double bed. The rooms come further equipped with state-of-the-art facilities such as an LCD satellite/cable TV, a direct dial telephone, wireless Internet access, as well as a safe and a minibar. Guests can expect to find tea and coffee making facilities and individually regulated air conditioning as standard.

This delightful hotel is situated just 8 km from Chennai's city centre. It offers guests the ideal setting from which to explore the cultural and historical attractions, charming restaurants and exciting entertainment venues the city has to offer including Marundeeswarar Temple, Ashtalakshmi Kovil, and Elliot's Beach. The hotel is a mere 12 km from the airport and 14 km from the railway station. This hotel offers guests refreshing, elegant surroundings in which to conduct business meetings or relax in comfort. The guest rooms are tastefully-decorated offering soothing, calming surroundings in which visitors can relax and unwind, enjoying a restful sleep at the end of the day.

This superb hotel is centrally located in Chennai and is close to the most important points of interest in the city. The hotel is situated just 15 kms from the International Airport, 5 kms from the railway station and a 15 minutes' drive from the popular shopping and commercial districts of Anna Salai and T. Nagar. This hotel greets guests with the ancient custom of hospitality for which India is renowned. This stunning hotel offers a blend of contemporary style and Indian embellishment and design. The guest rooms are spacious, luxuriously-appointed and feature a stunning mix of contemporary and traditional elements, creating a haven of style and serenity in which guests can relax and unwind. The hotel provides a host of first-class amenities and facilities for guests' convenience, catering to their leisure and dining needs.

name.content: Radisson Blu Hotel Chennai City Centre

description.content: Located in the heart of Chennai's city centre, the hotel is an all-new, upscale hotel offering luxurious accommodation and convenient services to the business and leisure traveller. Close to popular shopping destinations, and just 18 km from Anna International Airport, the hotel provides spacious, modern guest rooms and suites with comfortable furnishings and thoughtful amenities. Guests also enjoy on-site dining outlets, a bar and discotheque and 24-hour coffee shop. Featuring a refreshing pool and relaxing spa, this hotel is sure to quickly become one of the top hotels in the city.

address.content: NO 2 ETHIRAJ SALAI, C-IN-C ROAD, EGMORE,

description.content: This charming hotel is located close to Sunguvarchatram, just 40 km from Chennai. The hotel is conveniently situated close to the Chennai-Bangalore Highway. Enjoying a setting of 0.8 hectares of luxuriant greenery and landscaped grounds, this hotel offers a city break with difference. This oasis in the city offers guests comfortable, relaxing accommodation, ideal for a relaxing evening in, warm hospitality and wonderful service. Guests are invited to enjoy a delightful meal in the restaurant, where they can sample the seafood specialties it has to offer. On their downtime, guests can lounge by the pool or enjoy a refreshing swim, seemingly miles away from the city.

This hotel is located in close proximity to a host of main attractions in Chennai. Located in Vadapalani, the hotel is easily accessible from the station, airport, natural highways and the industrial estate of Ambattur. The hotel offers the perfect setting for business or leisure travellers visiting the city. The hotel exudes a pleasant sense of relaxation and serenity, and welcomes guests with soothing tones and warm hospitality. The guest rooms are beautifully designed, offering calming tones and a refreshing atmosphere, and the ideal place in which to relax and unwind at the end of the day. Guests are invited to enjoy an energetic workout in the gym, or can simply sit in the cafe for a coffee and a chat.

This hotel is located on the Old Mahabalipuram Road in the IITM Research Park in Chennai. Just a 45-minute drive will take guests to the airport, and the bus station is an hour drive away. Both business and leisure travellers will appreciate the location, and its close proximity to countless points of interest in the city. Guests are welcomed by warm hospitality, soothing tones and tranquil surroundings. The guest rooms are lovingly-decorated, featuring white tones, brought to life by hints of vibrant blue and red. The guest rooms offer the ideal environment in which to enjoy restful slumber. Guests will find a host of modern amenities at their disposal in the rooms, including an LCD TV for guests viewing pleasure.

Spread across 6 acres of peaceful land, the luxurious Leela Palace Chennai offers an outdoor pool, pampering spa treatments and a fitness centre. Its grand and well-designed rooms enjoy 24-hour room services. Free parking is available.Overlooking the sea, the spacious air-conditioned guestrooms all come with a 40-inch flat-screen TV, a well-stocked minibar and a sofa. Suites have a Blu-ray player and iPod docks. En suite bathrooms are equipped with a bathtub and hot-water showers.Leela Palace Chennai is 2 km from St. Thomas Basilica and Marina Beach. It is 4 km from Parthasarathy Temple. Anna International Airport and Kamaraj Domestic Airport are 16 km away.Spectra restaurant boasts 7 interactive kitchens and views of the Adyar River, while China Tang offers authentic Chinese cuisine. Other dining options include Jamavar Indian Restaurant and Italian Specialty Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at Library Bar and Lobby Lounge.

This premium business hotel is conveniently located in Chennai's central business district, only 20 minutes from the international airport and the city's information technology corridor. Situated right on Mount Road, the hotel enjoys proximity to The Chennai Trade Centre as well as important government institutions, consulates and prime residential areas, including Boat Club Road and Poes Garden.
The hotel's rooms are understatedly luxurious with crisp, white linens on plump beds, well-lit work areas, en suite bathrooms with rain showers, and wireless internet access. Guests might choose to dine in one of three in-house restaurants serving local specialties both buffet-style and a la carte, as well as authentic Italian dishes and street-food inspired Sichuan cuisine. There is also a gourmet deli shop, a sleek and trendy bar and a casual, residential-style lounge where guests can relax with a drink and chat with friends.

Located in Nungambakkam, The Taj Coromandel Offers a fusion of rich South Indian design cues and classic European elegance,the guest experiences the best of both worlds - business and leisure in the heart of the city.The hotel has 205 elegantly appointed rooms including 22 opulent suites with complete wireless internet connectivity, cyber butlers, a wide range of distinctive dining options, and more.

address.content: 37, MAHATMA GANDHI RD, NUNGAMBAKKAM, TAMIL NADU,

description.content: Located on Clubhouse road,It is famous for its magnificent homes of British luminaries, and as the original site of the renowned Madras Club - and off the historic Mount Road, Taj Mount Road has all it takes to make it the ideal venue for the discerning business traveller. As you approach, you will come face to face with a grand, 45,000 sq. ft. blue glass facade, that acts as a preview to all the hotel has to offer. A vibrant new-age atmosphere, a feast of dining options, warm contemporary accommodations and impeccable levels of service, that are at once attentive and unobtrusive.

address.content: Club House Road, Express Estate, Royapettah,2

description.content: This hotel is located on the North Usman Road, T.Nagar, just 5km from Central Railway Station, 12km from airport and 5km from Mount Road. The Hotel is very close to all facilities one needs while enjoying a luxurious stay. It is a brand new luxury hotel located in the heart of Chennai, India. Queensway Park is the ideal destination for leisure travellers, corporates and business people, as well as for shoppers for an exciting shopping experience mainly for jewellery and textiles. A 24 well designed and fully air-conditioned rooms make ones stay as pleasant as possible and the hotel staff only adds to it.

address.content: UNNAMALAIAMMAL STREET, NORTH USMAN ROAD, T. NAGAR,NEW NO.4

description.content: Conveniently situated in Chennai, this striking property is the perfect base for both business and holiday travel. Guests can take advantage of the airport transfer service which is available at this hotel. It provides air-conditioning in public areas, 24-hour reception and a safe for guests to store valuable items. In addition, guests can shop at the handy minimarket for any last-minute needs or forgotten toothbrushes. There is a lovely terrace where guests can relax with a book. Guests will adore the spacious rooms which are furnished with modern amenities. This hotel is perfect for families as it offers a babysitting service. Sports enthusiasts who want to keep to their workout regime can do so in the well-equipped gym. Moreover, this establishment allows pets, both large and small. Guests will have a pleasant stay here.

address.content: NO 50, OPPOSITE KARAIKUDI RESTAURANT, B N ROAD,

description.content: This budget-friendly establishment is designed and conceptualized to meet the needs of all travellers. It is set in a bustling area and the surroundings are lively all through the day. Both the airport and the railway station are within 10 km from the hotel, as is the popular Marina Beach and the Guindy Race Course. Business travellers can take advantage of the business centre, equipped with secretarial services and conference facilities. The banquet hall holds up to 100 participants, making wedding receptions and company functions possible. All rooms include a desk and complimentary wireless access, perfect for those travelling on business. Golf enthusiasts can make use of the golf desk to book their favourite tee time.

address.content: POONAMALLEE HIGH ROAD, NEAR KOYAMBEDU FLYOVER,85

description.content:
The hotel boasts of 113 plush and spacious rooms that combine verdant amenities and the comfort of home like environment. Between each day's adventures, guests can relax amid the warm, earthy ambience of your spacious room, and discover the various facilities at your beck and call: complimentary internet, a flat screen TV, electronic safe with a built-in laptop charger, a pillow menu to ensure that you sleep stress-free and all day in-room dining.
Placed in the Egmore area of Chennai, the hotel is placed nearby the Chennain Egmore Train Station.

address.content: Gandhi Irwin Road, Egmore Tamil Nadu,0

description.content:
The hotel, stringing together a spectacular selection of 179 rooms and suites, is an iconic 5-star corporate hotel in Chennai. From this property guests can expect the best quality features: world-class facilities, superb cuisine and spacious and inviting guestrooms. 
The hotel is strategically located at Semmencherry, Old Mahabalipuram Road, in the heart of the IT Corrridor in Chennai.

With its sweeping views of coconut palms and the Bay of Bengal, this modern beach resort hotel is the ideal destination for a romantic getaway or family holidays. Chennai International Airport and the Chennai Central railway station are both just a half hour drive away and the MGM Beach Resort is literally just across the road. This family-friendly resort offers plenty of activities to keep the kids happy, including movies and fun on the beach and the hotel's outdoor swimming pool. Adults can take advantage of the on-site Ayurvedic Spa for some deep healing and soothing massage or a Yoga session on the hotel's own private beach. The spacious rooms all feature huge picture windows opening onto the lush gardens as well as all essential modern amenities including flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The beachfront restaurant serves a selection of delicious local and international cuisine.

Hidden away in lush, landscaped gardens, this luxurious modern hotel is ideal for a relaxing vacation. It is conveniently located near Chennai International Airport and Chennai Central Railway Station and within easy reach of the area's many attractions and points of interest, including the Mayajaal Sports Complex and Marundeeswarar Temple. The lavishly-decorated guest rooms all feature balconies with beach, sea or garden views as well as cable TV and complimentary Wi-Fi and many other thoughtful details such as the free toiletries in the en suite bathroom. There is plenty to do without leaving the hotel as guests can use the splendid outdoor pool or enjoy a game of tennis or billiards. The in-house restaurant offers a selection of delicious local, Asian and International specialities and guests can start the day in style with the complimentary buffet breakfast.

Situated right on the edge of Guindy National Park in the dynamic commercial area of Velachery in Chennai, this elegant hotel offers comfort and convenience for a productive business trip or luxurious holiday. The hotel is just a five-minute walk from the Indian Institute of Technology campus with its wide array of shops, clubs and cafés in addition to the lecture halls and university buildings, and public transport stops can be found just outside the hotel as well as throughout the university campus. 
The hotel's 215 stylish rooms are decorated in soothing, earthy tones, all with premium bedding and luxury bath amenities, flat-screen television and an ergonomic workstation with high-speed internet access. Business travellers will appreciate the versatile conference centre, and guests can relax on a sun lounger by the contemporary outdoor pool before dining in one of three onsite restaurants serving health-conscious, local and international cuisines.

address.content: Velachery Main Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu,154

description.content: Set in a sprawling stretch of sand and greenery, this beach resort emanates grandeur in an elegant, yet striking manner. It is the perfect accommodation for both the leisure vacationer and the corporate professional looking to host a gathering in the most luxurious setting. All of the tastefully designed self-contained villas boast immediate access to the sea and are a perfect base for the creation of romantic memories. The resort is dedicated to satisfy the needs of all guests with amenities such as a swimming pool and sports complex, and a children play area. In addition to in-room dining the facility offers a rich multi-cuisine menus in the hotel restaurants and bars. Guests can taste a variety of select dishes, while enjoying breathtaking views of the bay and the coolness of the evening breeze.

name.content: Itc Grand Chola, A Luxury Collection Hotel

description.content: This ornate, palatial tribute to Southern India's greatest empires – the Imperial Cholas – overlooks lush green gardens in the heart of Chennai. It embodies the highest standards in Indian hospitality balanced with elegant restraint in a prime property with a distinct personality. Tastefully upholstered in elegant fabrics, delicate hues and soft furnishings, the guestrooms are the epitome of Indian grace and style and are thoughtfully furnished with amenities to meet the needs of both the business and the leisure travellers. The hotel SPA centre offers traditional local treatments for relaxation and rejuvenation, as well as western style therapies and an array of hair and beauty services. Even the most seasoned epicures will be impressed with the comprehensive selection of fine dishes and beverages in the hotel restaurants and bars.

This 3 star hotel is located in the city centre of Chennai. Situated only 10 km from Chennai International Airport, The Residency offers large, air-conditioned rooms and suites and contains a fitness centre. The 24-hour front desk can help organise car rental and an airport shuttle is available. Central Railway Station is 10 km away and the Chennai Bus Station is 6 km from the hotel.
This charming hotel is in Chennai (Madras). This property offers a total of 99 bedrooms. This is not a pet-friendly accommodation.
This charming hotel is located in Chennai (Madras). The total number of guests rooms is 36. No pets are allowed on the premises.

This comfortable hotel can be found in Chennai (Madras). A total of 31 rooms are available for guests' convenience. Those who dislike animals may enjoy their stay, as this property does not allow pets.

This business style hotel features modish decor and contemporary interiors across its swanky lobby, elegant corridors and in the lavish rooms, as well.Hotel offers free Wi-Fi, room service,an in-house restaurant,bar, business event arrangements & facilities and travel desk.The rooms are air conditioned, spaciously arranged with smart amenities such as a stocked mini fridge, safety locker, tea/coffee maker, a coffee table and an LCD television with DTH connection. 
The location of the property is another reason for being a preferred hotel among travellers. It's on the main road, easily accessible from major corporate centers and located between two major railway stations of Chennai Central and the Egmore railway station. Chennai airport, 20 km away.
If you want to dine out Malls like Alsa, Spencers Plaza and Express Avenue are all within 3 km. Along with all the good things in and around, the Marina Beach is 3km away from hotel you can rejuvenate by the beach in the evenings and you'll be replenished with the ambience, environment and the sound of the sea.

This modern, comfortable hotel is ideal for business travellers as it is located in the Ascendas IT Park, Taramani just 14 Km drive from the airport and with easy access to the city of Chennai. Visitors will find an abundance of places to visit such as museums, churches, temples and cultural sites all within easy reach. Hotel facilities include a gym, unlimited high speed internet access, currency exchange and laundry and dry cleaning services. An all-day coffee shop and restaurant provides international cuisine, whilst the lounge bar is an ideal place to relax. The rooms are spacious and furnished to a high standard with a bright, modern décor. They come with satellite television, free wired and wireless internet access, electronic safe, coffee maker, mini-bar, bottled water, hairdryer and an iron with ironing board. Non-smoking rooms are available on request.
